replies.bodyText:
As for Mirror Maker ... I was thinking about it. But I decided against it. It can be easily done with two Kafka clusters in one namespace and MM between them. But that is completely unrealistic since the clusters in reality would be running elsewhere and you cannot just mount the secrets out of the box. So I decided to skip it for the time being. We can add it later.
As for Cruise Control - I though it is locked down out of the box. Or does it have some security settings?
replies.author: scholzj
